Subject: Errors in upgradding
Description: Error 2 - errors occurred during installation - contact support
What_We_Know__c: The customer needed assistance with EPP Server Migration from Ubuntu 14 to Ubuntu 22.  I assisted the customer with the migration in a remote session using backup v2.  The migration was successful but after the epp clients re established connection to the new server the last seen time was consistently an hour ahead despite re-synchronizing the time via EPP Server UI under "Appliance" > "Server Maintenance"
Next_Steps__c: I had a remote session with the customer in which I manually have set the correct time via SSH to the EPP Server's backend.  The last seen time started to display correctly afterward.  Customer is happy and requested case be closed.
Solution_Comment__c: I had a remote session with the customer in which I manually have set the correct time via SSH to the EPP Server's backend.  The last seen time started to display correctly afterward.  Customer is happy and requested case be closed.
